title: The Blacklist || The Truth
author: Real Scorsese
comment: Thank you for your support on the Blacklist video. Do not hesitate to share it with the actors, I would love to see Megan Boone's opinion on the montage I made. On Twitter if you wish. I'm there !
DEMBE IS THE REAL DEFINITION OF LOYALTY
love the show, but it pisses me off knowing liz changes her mind towards and against red everytime someone tells her a story, he moves the world for her and shebetrays him with a snap of a finger
I really don’t care who Reddington is, as long as he’s Elisabeth’s father. I just love their father-daughter dynamic
I still think he is the real  reddington  and Liz 's father. The one everyone thinks is the fake Red is the one who died.
description:
New montage on The Blacklist, with music by Ruelle that I really like

Song : 
Ruelle - Madness
Nancy Sinatra - These Boots Are Made For Walkin
